main.name: Susetyo Pambudi
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Susetyo Pambudi! You can call me Tyo. I've been coding for over 4 years now. As a Frontend developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others with my code to solve their problem.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Make a website, mobile web and apps.

testimonials.text: Tio is excellent engineer, he always learn faster than others. Tio and me are working together covering display modules in iLotte.com. He also help me for improving login performance issue.
testimonials.user: Imam Nurhadianto - Software Engineer at iStyle.id

testimonials.text: Susetyo is one of my best partner in works and life. We worked at the same company in many times. When we discussed something, he always give me a good idea and we working on it, the result is brilliant! He lead a team well and cappable to brief his team to achieve the mission. It's amazing to work with him and I trust in him everything ! He got my back, and I got his back
testimonials.user: Ali Reza Yudhistira - Head of Product and Cloud Infrastructure
